summary: This document is an Inter Vivos Revocable Trust Rider related to the Requiro Terra, LLC, detailing the roles and responsibilities of the trustee(s) and settlor(s) in relation to the trust and property. It outlines the covenants and agreements made between the trustee(s), settlor(s), and lender, including conditions for changes to the trust and property management.

persons.name: Requiro Terra, LLC
persons.context: Requiro Terra, LLC is identified as the trustee of the Revocable Trust, responsible for managing the trust and its property.

persons.name: Fifth Third Mortgage Company
persons.context: Fifth Third Mortgage Company is mentioned as the lender involved in the security instrument related to the trust.

persons.name: IMIL Iter Vivo
persons.context: IMIL Iter Vivo is mentioned as a settlor of the Revocable Trust, acknowledging the terms and covenants of the trust.

connections.description: Requiro Terra, LLC acts as the trustee for the Revocable Trust established by IMIL Iter Vivo.
Requiro Terra, LLC, as trustee, is the borrower in the security instrument with Fifth Third Mortgage Company as the lender.

keyFacts: The document is an Inter Vivos Revocable Trust Rider dated December 10, 2014.
Requiro Terra, LLC is the trustee of the Revocable Trust and is responsible for managing the property.
Fifth Third Mortgage Company is identified as the lender in the security instrument.
IMIL Iter Vivo is acknowledged as a settlor of the Revocable Trust.
The document outlines the responsibilities and agreements related to the management and transfer of the trust and property.
